title: #204: Iran with Robbie Martin
description:
Thank you for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Media Roots Radio's Robbie Martin to discuss the Deep States desperate attempt to drag the United States into with Iran.
